segments.text: Good morning , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to buy a car to facilitate my life . But I don't have enough money . Could you supply a loan to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . Would you mind telling me your monthly salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . We can supply you a loan . How much do you want to loan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 200,000 yuan . By the way , what about the interest rate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's only 4.5 % for one-year loan . Do you want to apply now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Please fill out this loan application .
segments.speaker: S1
